The following table shows the regular trading hours for the Hong Kong 50 contract in the CFD market:

Monday01:15:00 to 04:00:00, 05:00:00 to 08:30:00, 09:15:00 to 19:00:00
Tuesday01:15:00 to 04:00:00, 05:00:00 to 08:30:00, 09:15:00 to 19:00:00
Wednesday01:15:00 to 04:00:00, 05:00:00 to 08:30:00, 09:15:00 to 19:00:00
Thursday01:15:00 to 04:00:00, 05:00:00 to 08:30:00, 09:15:00 to 19:00:00
Friday01:15:00 to 04:00:00, 05:00:00 to 08:30:00, 09:15:00 to 19:00:00
